prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with dark colors and electric blue accents that can fly.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the power of electricity and has a strong presence.
Generate a fierce-looking Pokemon with black scales and glowing blue markings on its body.
Make a powerful, bipedal Pokemon that commands respect and has a striking wingspan.
Imagine a mythical creature with a combination of dragon and electric type attributes.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has both intimidating and awe-inspiring features.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines dark and electric elements in its design.
